mapper.select: select rcp_seq as board_id, rcp_nm as title, att_file_no_main as thumbnail_image, "식품안전나라" as nickname, (select count(*) from interest_recipes where rcp_seq=recipes.rcp_seq and user_id=(select user_id from users where email=#{email})) as favorite from ssafy_open.recipes limit #{page}, 12

select ssafy_open.recipes.rcp_seq as rcp_seq, rcp_nm, hash_tag, att_file_no_main, att_file_no_mk, rcp_parts_dtls, manual_id, manual_text, manual_img from ssafy_open.recipes join ssafy_open.manuals on ssafy_open.recipes.rcp_seq = ssafy_open.manuals.rcp_seq

select ssafy_open.recipes.rcp_seq as rcp_seq, rcp_nm, hash_tag, att_file_no_main, att_file_no_mk, rcp_parts_dtls, manual_id, manual_text, manual_img from ssafy_open.recipes join ssafy_open.manuals on ssafy_open.recipes.rcp_seq = ssafy_open.manuals.rcp_seq where ssafy_open.recipes.rcp_seq = #{rcpSeq}
select rcp_seq as boardId, rcp_nm as title, att_file_no_main as thumbnailImage, "식품안전나라" as nickname from ssafy_open.recipes where rcp_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #{rcpNm}, '%')

select rcp_seq as boardId, rcp_nm as title, att_file_no_main as thumbnailImage, "식품안전나라" as nickname from ssafy_open.recipes
rcp_parts_dtls LIKE CONCAT('%', #{rcpPartsDtl}, '%')
limit #{page}, 12
select count(*) from interest_recipes where user_id=(select user_id from users where email = #{email}) and rcp_seq=#{boardId}

select `recipes`.`rcp_seq` as board_id, `recipes`.`rcp_nm` as title, "식품안전나라" as nickname, `recipes`.`att_file_no_main` as thumbnail_image from `ssafy_sk`.`interest_recipes` as `interest_recipes` join `ssafy_open`.`recipes` as `recipes` on `interest_recipes`.`rcp_seq` = `recipes`.`rcp_seq` where `interest_recipes`.`user_id` = (select user_id from users where email = #{email})
mapper.insert: insert into interest_recipes(user_id, rcp_seq) values ((select user_id from users where email = #{email}), #{boardId});
